name: filfbas
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wral(hs0, cpw(c1), wi(wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
